adm: Unique factorization of C≥12 satisfying L_nc+L_loc+A1. No other product group is admissible.
falsify: Discovery of additional gauge bosons (Z', W') not from SSB would require larger group.
indep: Derived from axioms alone via capacity budget + anomaly cancellation.

adm: Largest simple factor in the minimal admissible gauge group. SU(3) from non-abelian locality.
falsify: Observation of fractional-charge free quarks would indicate deconfinement beyond SU(3).

adm: Chiral routing requires exactly SU(2). SU(3)_weak would overconsume capacity.
falsify: Detection of additional weak bosons not from SSB.

adm: Single U(1) hypercharge. Additional U(1) factors create Landau poles violating A1.
falsify: Discovery of a dark photon from a second U(1).

adm: Unique d where Weyl spinors are 2-component and compatible with gauge structure. d>4 creates KK modes violating A1.
falsify: Detection of large extra dimensions at colliders.
indep: Derived from spinor + gauge compatibility, independent of matter content.

adm: Causal propagation (L_irr) requires exactly one timelike dimension.
falsify: Observation of acausal signal propagation.

adm: Metric = capacity geometry. Perturbation of symmetric 2-tensor → spin-2 massless mode.
falsify: Detection of massive graviton or spin≠2 gravitational mode.

adm: Ledger monotonicity from L_irr (irreversibility) → thermodynamic arrow.
falsify: Observation of macroscopic time-reversal.

adm: 3 gens exhaust 45/61 Weyl DOF. 4th requires C≥76, violating A1. Algebraically: N²+6=5N → N=3.
falsify: Discovery of a 4th-generation fermion at any mass.
indep: From capacity saturation, independent of gauge or cosmology.

adm: Unique chiral Weyl set cancelling all gauge anomalies (L_nc), avoiding Landau poles (A1).
falsify: Discovery of new chiral fermion not in this set.

adm: EW pivot requires massive scalar to redistribute capacity. Unique bridge making EWSB admissible.
falsify: If EWSB occurred without a fundamental scalar (technicolor-like).
indep: From capacity redistribution requirement at EW scale.

adm: Anomaly cancellation Diophantine system has unique rational solution. Not a choice.
falsify: Measurement of irrational or non-third-integer quark charges.

adm: Same Diophantine system. Lepton charge = −1 is forced.
falsify: Same as Q_u.

adm: Unique neutral member of the lepton doublet.
falsify: Discovery of neutrino electric charge (millicharge).

adm: Q_p=2(2/3)+(−1/3)=1, Q_e=−1. Exact cancellation from enforcement consistency.
falsify: Detection of proton-electron charge asymmetry (tested to 10⁻²¹).

adm: Ratio of non-abelian enforcement channels at capacity fixed point. 3=dim(SU(2))−1; 13=total directional cost. All gates closed: S0 (interface schema invariance) proved by T_S0, R-gate closed by Δ_geo.
falsify: If SU(2) saturation were not reached at EW scale, 3/13 would shift.
indep: EW sector only. Independent of cosmology.

adm: Direct consequence of sin²θ_W = 3/13. The Weinberg relation M_W = M_Z cos θ_W is structural.
falsify: Same as sin²θ_W — any deviation in one implies deviation in other.

adm: 42 structural vacuum DOF: 27 gauge-index slots + 3 Higgs internals + 12 generators. No distinguishable labels.
falsify: If vacuum energy were field-dependent (quintessence), this ratio would run with redshift.
indep: Vacuum capacity residual. Independent of matter counting.

adm: 19 matter-sector capacity: 3 gen labels + 16 multiplet refs. Capacity carrying distinguishable information.
falsify: Additional light species (sterile ν, axions) would shift this upward.

adm: Capacity carrying flavor quantum numbers = N_gen = 3 generation labels.
falsify: 4th generation at any mass → 4/X. Discovery of baryonic dark matter → ratio shifts.
indep: From generation count (T4F). Independent of dark sector.

adm: 16 enforcement references: 5 multiplets × 3 gens + 1 Higgs. No gauge charge → dark.
falsify: If DM carried SM gauge charge, the labeled/unlabeled partition breaks.
indep: From field content (T_field). Independent of Λ calculation.

adm: Baryon fraction = flavor-labeled / total matter. Pure combinatorics.
falsify: Same as Ω_b and Ω_DM — any change to field content shifts this.
indep: Redundant cross-check of Ω_b and Ω_m.

adm: 16 enforcement refs carry capacity but no gauge charge → gravitationally active, photon-invisible.
falsify: If all matter were gauge-charged (no enforcement overhead).

adm: 42 unlabeled capacity entries = nonzero vacuum energy. Λ=0 requires C_vac=0, violating DOF budget.
falsify: If vacuum had zero structural capacity (impossible given gauge content).

adm: The dark matter DOF count equals the boson sector count. Not coincidence — enforcement references = gauge + Higgs.
falsify: Would fail if N_mult ≠ 16.
indep: Algebraic identity connecting gauge and dark sectors.

adm: Capacity saturation condition. Only N=3 satisfies this as a positive integer.
falsify: Would fail if N_gen ≠ 3 (but N_gen is already derived).

adm: RG mechanism derived from capacity competition (T20-T21). β-coefficients are pure QFT calibration, confirmed to 10⁻⁴. Not a free parameter.
falsify: If running deviated from 1-loop prediction (would indicate new physics at intermediate scale).
indep: Uses imported β-functions. Structural form from FCF, coefficients from QFT.

adm: QCD coupling from capacity RG running (T20-T21). β-coefficients are QFT calibration confirmed to 10⁻⁴, not a gap.
falsify: Deviation from perturbative running would signal confinement-scale new physics.

adm: C_total=61 (no ν_R) matches Planck 1σ. C=64 (Dirac) gives 2.5σ tension.
falsify: Non-detection of 0νββ at full LEGEND/nEXO/CUPID sensitivity.
indep: Capacity argument. Independent of all other predictions.

adm: DM = enforcement overhead, not a particle. No production cross-section with SM fields.
falsify: Detection of DM particle at direct detection experiments or colliders.
indep: From DM identification as capacity, not particle.

adm: When two subsystems share enforcement load (non-factorizing interface), the external feasibility functional is forced to be quadratic in displacement, local, universal, and endpoint-symmetric. The unique such object is a metric tensor g_μν. Gravity is not postulated—it is the bookkeeping cost of shared enforcement.
falsify: Discovery of a sector that couples to energy-momentum but violates the equivalence principle (non-universal gravity). Or: gravitational shielding of any kind.
indep: Pure capacity argument from A1+L_irr. Independent of gauge group, field content, or cosmology.

adm: Five admissibility conditions A9.1–A9.5 are each derived from Γ_geo closure: locality (L_loc), coordinate invariance (L_loc coarse-grain), conservation (∇_μTᵚᵤ = 0 from ledger balance), ≤2nd derivatives (Γ_fbc C² bound), wave propagation (L_irr causal records). Lovelock’s theorem then uniquely selects the Einstein tensor + Λ. This is a mathematical theorem—not a physical assumption.
falsify: Confirmed deviation from GR at any scale: f(R) gravity, massive graviton, Lorentz violation. Current bounds: Cassini 2003 (PPN γ−1 < 2.3×10⁻⁵), LIGO graviton mass < 1.76×10⁻²³ eV.
indep: Lovelock is a mathematical theorem (1971). FCF’s contribution: deriving A9.1–A9.5 from axioms + d=4 from T8.

adm: δg_μν has 10 components (symmetric 4×4). Bianchi identity removes 4 (conservation). Diffeomorphism gauge removes 4 more. Remaining: 2 physical transverse-traceless DOF = massless spin-2. Mass forbidden by gauge invariance (Boulware-Deser ghost in massive case).
falsify: Detection of massive graviton: m_g > 0 gives 5 DOF + Boulware-Deser ghost. Current bound: m_g < 1.76×10⁻²³ eV (LIGO O3). Or: detection of scalar/vector GW polarizations (spin ≠ 2).
indep: Standard linearized GR. FCF derives the metric (T7B) and d=4 (T8) from which this follows.

adm: Massless little group in d dimensions is SO(d−2). In d=4: SO(2), helicity ±2. In d=3: SO(1) → 0 DOF (topological). In d=5: SO(3) → 5 DOF. Only d=4 gives exactly 2 propagating polarizations compatible with L_irr records.
falsify: Detection of additional GW polarization modes (breathing, longitudinal, vector). Current LIGO+Virgo+KAGRA analyses constrain non-tensorial polarizations to <10% amplitude (GW170814).
indep: From d=4 (T8) + massless representation theory. Changes if d≠4 or m_graviton > 0.

adm: T_μν measures irreversibly committed internal enforcement load. Curvature measures spatial variation of external feasibility. Conversion: κ must have dimensions [capacity]⁻¹, so κ ~ 1/C_* where C_* is the A1 bound. The O(1) prefactor requires UV completion.
falsify: If gravitational coupling did not scale inversely with any capacity-like quantity. Equivalently: if adding capacity to a system did not weaken its gravitational self-interaction.
indep: From T7B (gravity = non-factorization) + dimensional analysis on capacity. Independent of gauge or matter.

adm: After all enforcement commitments (45 Weyl + 4 Higgs + 12 gauge = 61 DOF budget), 42 unlabeled vacuum entries remain. Residual is positive (C_total > C_committed) and small (absolute density suppressed by 1/C_*²). Explains the 120-order-of-magnitude fine-tuning: not tuned, it is an integer ratio divided by a huge capacity scale.
falsify: Evidence for quintessence (time-varying Λ) or Λ < 0 (AdS universe). Current: Λ constant to ~2% (DES+Planck). Also: 42/61 disagreeing with Ω_Λ by >3σ.
indep: From capacity budget (T3+T11). Independent of matter sector counting.

adm: Aspiration: promote classical EFE to operator equation on Type III₁ von Neumann algebra via GNS. Modular flow = time. Semi-classical recovers classical EFE. HOWEVER: modular variation δS/δA not rigorously defined; g_μν promotion aspirational; Dirac operator D not constructed. Research direction, not theorem.
falsify: N/A—not yet a sharp prediction.
indep: Requires full T1/T2 integration with gravity. Main open frontier.

adm: Tomita-Takesaki theorem (1970): for any faithful normal state ω on a von Neumann algebra A, there exists a unique modular automorphism group σ_t. L_irr forces KMS condition; L_nc forces Type III₁. The modular flow is canonical time evolution without external parameter. Rigorous mathematical result applied to admissibility.
falsify: If time evolution in quantum gravity required an external background structure not derivable from algebraic state. Connes’ thermal time hypothesis (1994) makes the same structural claim.
indep: Mathematical theorem (Tomita 1967, Takesaki 1970). FCF identifies the physical context.

adm: Structural: vacuum stability gives m_H near metastability boundary. Absolute value needs κ (T10).
falsify: N/A — not yet a sharp prediction.
indep: Requires gravity sector (T10) for absolute scale.

adm: Yukawa hierarchy structure derived (near-diagonal CKM, mass ratios scale with capacity cost). Absolute scale open.
falsify: N/A — not yet sharp.

adm: Lightest charged lepton. Mass value requires Yukawa structure completion.
falsify: N/A.

adm: 2nd-gen lepton. Ratio m_μ/m_e ≈ 207 from Yukawa hierarchy, not yet derived.
falsify: N/A.

adm: 3rd-gen lepton.
falsify: N/A.

adm: Lightest quark.
falsify: N/A.

adm: 2nd-lightest quark.
falsify: N/A.

adm: Capacity cost minimization → V_CKM ≈ I. |V_ub|≪|V_cb|≪|V_us| follows mass hierarchy. Pattern derived, not values.
falsify: If CKM were far from identity (e.g. maximal mixing in quark sector).

adm: Lepton mixing. Near-degenerate neutrino masses → large mixing is cheap. Not yet quantitative.
falsify: N/A.

adm: Upper bound from capacity: m_ν ≤ C_int·(ε_ν/ε_t). Correct order of magnitude.
falsify: If neutrino masses were above the capacity bound.

adm: CP phase. FCF derives that CP violation must exist (L_irr → arrow of time) but not the angle.
falsify: N/A.

adm: Strong CP problem. FCF has not yet addressed why θ_QCD ≈ 0.
falsify: N/A.

adm: Absolute gravity scale. Requires κ (Newton's constant) from T10. Currently the main open gap.
falsify: N/A.

adm: Confinement scale. RG running from capacity fixed point could predict this, but requires absolute scale.
falsify: N/A.
